function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through international transport networks","Impact":"Global spread of diseases, high mortality rates, economic disruption","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols for international travel, enhanced border control measures, and rapid response systems for disease outbreaks","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, contact tracing apps, rapid testing kits","People":"International travelers, transport workers, global population","Owner":"National health authorities, international organizations, transport companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of local mobility needs and conditions in transport policy","Impact":"Inefficient and inequitable transport systems, lack of accessibility, environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive local needs assessments, involve community stakeholders in policy development, prioritize sustainable and inclusive transport solutions","Technologies":"GIS mapping, data analytics for traffic patterns, public engagement platforms","People":"Local residents, marginalized communities, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of cooperation and coordination in international policy making","Impact":"Inconsistency in global transport regulations, barriers to cross-border travel and trade, geopolitical tensions","Mitigation":"Establish international agreements and partnerships, promote information sharing and collaboration, develop unified standards and protocols for transport systems","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, communication and collaboration tools, data sharing platforms","People":"Government officials, diplomatic representatives, international organizations","Owner":"State and non-state actors, diplomatic bodies, international governing bodies"}]}
